title: Mark Anthony Awere
text:
Mark Anthony Awere (born 16 July 1971) is a <a href="Ghana">Ghana</a>ian <a href="long%20jump">long jump</a>er.
He won bronze medals at the <a href="1998%20African%20Championships%20in%20Athletics">1998 African Championships</a> and the <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%201999%20All-Africa%20Games">1999 All-Africa Games</a>. He also competed at the 2000 Olympic Games.
His personal best jump is 8.04 metres, achieved in June 1999 in <a href="Bad%20Langensalza">Bad Langensalza</a>.
In 2003, Awere <a href="List%20of%20doping%20cases%20in%20sport">tested positive</a> for <a href="Doping%20%28sport%29">doping</a> in <a href="Mulhouse">Mulhouse</a>. He was banned for three months.
